name: Echo Facility Greybox
description:
Play as Cain Jenson, a detective sent down a suspicious rabbit hole beginning with the strange death of a childhood friend. His investigation leads him to the Echo Facility, a science center. Cain must traverse the building and uncover the secrets that lie just below.

A level design prototype project for college.

We were tasked with creating a mission design document. That contains a much more detailed narrative description than the one above. We also needed to create a moodboard as well as maps for each type of play.

Cain can sneak in stealthily or charge in taking out absolutely anyone any everyone. For the purposes of this demo, Cain can walk, jump and crouch.
